title: Arrivals
description: We pull up. The mandem looking clean. The ladies are luscious. Marvel at the beauty of the people. Cheeky snaps here and there. Catch up with the mutuals you ain't seen in a minute.

title: Icebreakers
description: We break out from the circles we're familiar with. We form new bonds; establish new networks. We take a moment to reminisce on the friendship. Better brush up on your Zavid know-how too. Don't say I didn't warn ya.

title: Dining
description: We chow a set three-course meal. Be you carnivore or vegetarian, we got you covered. Whether the food bangs or not, you can remain comforted at the fact that you're not paying for it.

title: Speeches / Tributes
description: You'd know by now I'm a sucker for making people feel appreciated. I'll have abundant gratitude to express in words that night. Maybe you might too*.

title: Vibes
description: The night becomes young. We spend it how we see fit. Whether we dance, we network, we chill, or we capture the moments - we live.
